title: HelloWorldConfig
description: Describes the configuration the hello-world task

fail.description: true to throw an error for the task, failing the task

passOnRetry.description: If configured to fail, true to pass (not throw an error) when retried

bucket.description: bucket to write state information to handle the passOnRetry. Required if passOnRetry is true.

execution.description: execution name, used to write state information for passOnRetry. Required if passOnRetry is true.
